Sentencas: The powder of Zr(0.92)Y(0.08)O(2) (YSZ), Ce(0.9)Gd(0.1)O(2-delta) (GDC) and Sm(0.15)Ce(0.85)O(2-delta) (SDC) compounds from the company Fuel Cell Materials were used for sintering of ceramic samples in air at temperature T = 1673 K.
Titulo: PECULIARITIES OF IONIC TRANSPORT OF OXYGEN VACANCY CONDUCTING SUPERIONIC CERAMICS

Sentencas: The surface of the prepared ceramics was studied by scanning electron microscopy (SEM) and X-ray photoelectron spectroscopy (XPS).
Titulo: PECULIARITIES OF IONIC TRANSPORT OF OXYGEN VACANCY CONDUCTING SUPERIONIC CERAMICS

Sentencas: Results of the performed XPS investigations revealed that cerium exists as Ce(3+) and Ce(4+) in both the Ce(0.9)Gd(0.1)O(2-delta) and Sm(0.15)Ce(0.85)O(2-delta) ceramics.
Titulo: PECULIARITIES OF IONIC TRANSPORT OF OXYGEN VACANCY CONDUCTING SUPERIONIC CERAMICS

Sentencas: XPS spectra of O 1s of all the investigated materials demonstrated two peaks corresponding to oxygen O(1) in crystal lattice and to adsorbed oxygen O(2).
Titulo: PECULIARITIES OF IONIC TRANSPORT OF OXYGEN VACANCY CONDUCTING SUPERIONIC CERAMICS

Sentencas: Measurements of complex impedance, electric conductivity, dielectric permittivity, and tan delta of dielectric losses were carried out in frequency range 10(6)-1.2.10(9)
Titulo: PECULIARITIES OF IONIC TRANSPORT OF OXYGEN VACANCY CONDUCTING SUPERIONIC CERAMICS

Sentencas: Hz at temperatures ranging from 300 K to 700 K. Relaxation dispersion of the electric parameters has been found for all the compounds.
Titulo: PECULIARITIES OF IONIC TRANSPORT OF OXYGEN VACANCY CONDUCTING SUPERIONIC CERAMICS

Sentencas: The dispersion is caused by the oxygen vacancy (V(O center dot center dot)) transport in grains of the ceramic samples.
Titulo: PECULIARITIES OF IONIC TRANSPORT OF OXYGEN VACANCY CONDUCTING SUPERIONIC CERAMICS
